response.raw_message_text:
```json
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age_18", "low", "Young age with limited criminal history; minimal recidivism risk"),
    ("race_white", "medium", "Historical racial disparities in sentencing but neutral on individual behavior"),
    ("arrests_convictions_count_3", "high", "Significant past criminal activity"),
    ("height_weight", "low", "Physical attributes unrelated to recidivism"),
    ("marital_status_unmarried", "low", "Marital status does not directly influence recidivism"),
    ("education_no_high_school", "medium", "Lack of formal education increases risk but is moderate compared to other factors"),
    ("employment_status_no_jobs", "high", "Unemployment and lack of employment opportunities increase recidivism"),
    ("drug_use_past_4_years", "high", "Drug use history, especially with recent relapse, significantly raises risk"),
    ("depression_feeling", "medium-high", "Mental health issues (low mood) contribute to increased vulnerability"),
    ("family_history_rural_area", "low", "Rural upbringing without direct familial criminal influence"),
    ("spiritual_beliefs_no_god", "high", "Lack of spiritual belief system may reduce deterrence")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 85
}
```

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 3 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 135 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held no jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 6, in a rural area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
